column4: hi, my ethernet connection is not working; the little lights in the port don't blink so i think it's not even being recognized. I'm in a Toshiba P305-S8842. Any help would be appreciated.
if you dont get a link light.. its likely a bad cable or a crossover cable type
but evyerhting works when i'm on windows, and the lights do blink there.... i don't think it's the hardware...
i will try to help.. i only have a few moments /join #SeaPhor
